column4: so... my minimize, close program, and maximize buttons disappeared in the top right of every window, and i cant move the window, its locked into place... how do i undo it?
try clt-alt-f1 , do you get a text console?
that was a test to see if your machine was frozen
and finally, are you typing in the gui right now?
do you see the panel? does it respond at all?
ok, press alt-f2 , you should get a run dialog box. If you don't see it, look in the window list
I don't have a clue how to fix that, it just suddenly started working for me one day
yes, I'd just do the alt-f2  compiz --replace   dance

ok, try sudo aptitude install emerald compizconfig-settings-manager , when that's done try alt-f2   compiz --replace  &&  emerald --replace  (that will start compiz, and start up the emerald theme manager)
then I'm not sure what your problem is, but something isn't right with your compiz. I've pretty much told you everything I know
